short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Manager is a powerful extension that empowers users to organize, access, and manage their browser tabs for enhanced productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Manager is a powerful and versatile browser extension that revolutionizes the way users organize and manage their online tabs. With its intuitive and user-friendly interface, Tab Manager empowers individuals to streamline their workflow and boost their productivity.

The standout feature of Tab Manager is its robust project and collection management system. Users can create an unlimited number of projects, each of which can house multiple collections. These collections serve as customizable containers for storing web links, enabling users to group and organize their tabs with ease.

One of the extension's most valuable capabilities is its ability to import entire browser windows and their associated tabs into a new collection with a single click. Users can also manually drag and drop tabs into the desired collections, providing ultimate control over their tab management. Furthermore, collections can be rearranged within projects, and links can be seamlessly moved between collections.

Tab Manager offers a comprehensive suite of tools to enhance user experience. With the click of a button, users can open all links within a collection in a new window or open them individually. The extension also supports the import and export of project, collection, and link data, allowing for easy backup and restoration.

For enhanced personalization, users can change the title and URL of individual links, as well as minimize and maximize collections to maintain a clean and organized workspace. Additionally, Tab Manager now supports light and dark mode themes, allowing users to choose their preferred visual style.

A unique feature of Tab Manager is its synchronization capabilities, enabling users to access their links, collections, and projects across multiple devices seamlessly.

Tab Manager is an indispensable tool for professionals, researchers, and anyone who juggles multiple online tasks and resources. By streamlining tab management, this extension empowers users to regain control over their digital workspace, boost productivity, and stay focused on the task at hand.

Key Features:
- Unlimited projects and collections for organizing tabs
- Import entire browser windows and their tabs into new collections with a single click
- Manually drag and drop tabs into desired collections
- Rearrange collections within projects and move links between collections
- Open all links within a collection in a new window or open them individually
- Import and export project, collection, and link data for backup and restoration
- Personalize links by changing titles and URLs
- Minimize and maximize collections for a clean and organized workspace
- Intuitive and user-friendly interface for enhanced productivity
- Light and dark mode themes for a personalized visual experience
- Synchronization of links, collections, and projects across devices

Benefits:
- Streamlines tab management for enhanced workflow and focus
- Empowers users to organize online resources and information
- Boosts productivity by providing easy access to relevant tabs and links
- Enables backup and restoration of valuable tab data
- Customizable features for personalized tab organization
- Suitable for professionals, researchers, and anyone juggling multiple online tasks
- Consistent experience across multiple devices with synchronization

Here is a list of features that need to be added to the "Tab Manager" extension:
- Moving collections to another project
- A simpler display option where one collection is displayed, similar to the Chrome default new tab display
- Possibility to share the collection
- Bookmarks
- Notes
- To-do list

Release Notes
Version 1.1
- Added Light/Dark theme support to provide a better user experience based on the user's preferred theme settings.
Version 2.0
- Synchronization capabilities to access links, collections, and projects across multiple devices seamlessly.
Version 2.1
- Links with incorrect data may have appeared when links were dragged.
- Better definition of the list item key parameter
